tombstone.epitaph:
Invitation, "Invitation for Xmas Exhibition of Viennese Objets d'Art, Bloomsbury Gallery, London".
Letterpress on light brown wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-46.
